title: Adbitco
author: Adbitco
content: I came across this post and i was touched to report it here because it's a slap to our entire board for someone from Nigeria to go make such post, I don't even know who brought such user without even giving them proper orientation. There are some post you would want to make that requires reasoning before releasing those post or even possible try consult your boss or your madam who brought you here do you think we are upto 1,000 users here or we more than? Quote from: PhilixCrpt on December 13, 2023, 04:51:04 PMBitcointalk.org has become a blessing a large number of unemployed youths in most low income countries around the globe.From my observation, Bitcointalk.org has helped in creating wealth creation for thousands of unemployed youths.This has helped in reducing unemployment and in turn boasting the Nigerian economy through Wealth Creation.Thanks to the originator of this life saving platform that has engaged millions around the World.Truthfully, platforms like this has helped in reducing crime rate in many Countries by engaging mostly the young generation that would have resorted to crime.I have seen so many struggling youths, now financially self reliant and helping others around their communities with resources made via this platform.Kudos to the inventor(s) of this great platform. üôèüëçüëè‚úçÔ∏èIf i am not mistakenly we are only less than 200 active users who are in this forum that doesn't mean they are earning money, earning is from bitcoin investment and not bitcointalk- that is to say here is a community to get information and acts or not act according to information you get or not but for saying this forum has helped thousands of person from we kontry is a kind of slap although I can say that lots of Nigerians are into cryptocurrency investment, trading and whatever but not solely depending on this forum and even as that you should be guided properly before going out to the english board to post. I know say e get plenty newbies wey dey come here to come hustle but that no means say you go come blow up the cover onto say you wan earn or receive merits to just put bad records to our face. Please if i should come across such post again I don't mind reporting those as shitposting or spamming then such will be ban. ¬†Any person wey carry you come here make him go show you road how to take talk and how to carry post because you are bring shame to our local board. Due to some things wey i see i stop to dey post here because every time na the same story, the same post with another format organized in a different ways and to me i think we are more than so let us stop to dey bring our names after we don go up finished one newbies wey from no where go just ruined our reputation this one wey every body don dey give strength say wey dey try no be where we go just come messed ourselves up onto say we dey introduced people to follow hustle abeg make una mind the kind of incompetent people we carry come here next time before theymos go vex delete our localboard oo. I no wan talk much but anyhow una fit comment here make we reason the matter.

comments.author: Barikui1
comments.body: First of all thank you for bringing this issue come inside house so we fit trash dis issue.I want all of us to know say if we paint ourselves ugly picture outside, na so dem go take dy look all of us wey get naija blood. abeg most of this oyibo dem no see us as anything, dem believe say dem better pass us which we , we know say na lie, naija no dy carry last for anything, even though our government dy rubbish our economy, e no mean say we go dy campaign am give person wey no belong to the family abeg, just as the op don talk already, make we no carry desperation and hustling for merit take spoil ourselves give this people abeg.

comments.author: knowngunman
comments.body: The way I vex after seeing that post Omo na only God knows I swear. I thought it was in our local board sef when I received notification for telegram but clicking on the link, na general board e take me to. I was like no no no be Nigeria person post this but impersonator disguise as a Nigerian. Even for this our local board, that kind post no necessary at all talk more of public boards. That guy really shame us for here. I don prepare my response but the thread was locked before I should finish with what I was doing. God really save him because make I no lie, na fact I go tell am if he like make him vex.The painful part be say the guy no dey remorseful at all for the trash wey him post and dey even insult people wey he suppose learn from https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5477748.msg63320498#msg63320498 imagine justifying nonsense with nonsense boldly. He's not ready to learn from his actions in that thread. Nigeria is not the most poorest country and we should not be painting ourselves as the poverty headquarter in public domain. I don't want to mention names but people from some countries are very desperate in signature and bounties than the way we Nigerians dey run our affairs here.To everyone wey dey introduce people come this forum, abeg make una dey take time to guide them so we no go dey see such embarrassment because I no too blame that guy but the unguided friend wey him talk say introduce him here. Even thou na merit you dey look for, you no suppose downgrade your fatherland for personal gain. There are other ways to earn merit without disgracing us before the whole.Lastly, make the guy post apology under this thread because we deserve it from him or her and delete that disgusting post. Locking the thread is not enough because e go dey break my heart if I waka jam am anytime. I'm very disappointed in whosoever is behind that account.

comments.author: Hatchy
comments.body: Quote from: Adbitco on December 14, 2023, 09:32:01 AMI no wan talk much but anyhow una fit comment here make we reason the matter.d truth be say, I no really blame d guy, na person wey introduce am enter forum na e I go blame. I sha know say e no even still be dat one fault o becos from waitin d guy talk for there, e show say d person be dey try help e life but I swear na wrong person e go help. Since I join dis forum. I don see so many yeye people but most of Dem dey learn and na dey make Dem grow. But dis one wan con dey form jadon for forum. E even dey boast say if to say Dem know who e be, Dem for no dey follow am talk.¬†If dis guy see me for real life e fit run o. We no dey brag shit for forum no mean say we no know who we be. No be forum dey feed me or most naija persons for here and e suppose dey think am but as person wey no smart, e just go dey spit rubbish commot from mouth. No body dey find e apology, becos of e come naija board na still disaster e go come create. Sha na to follow am back to back. D guy no smart at all.

comments.author: Churchillvv
comments.body: I notice am too say some Nigerians want come dey fuck us up for here with there nonsensical posts. When saw that post I vex weytin no nice if you read although the thread you go see my comment. The reputation wey Nigerians get for this forum go come spoil because of some vagabonds wey no Sabi weytin to do around the forum. Normally most countries for here hate naija because of the reputation wey yahoo boys do create around Nigerians but inside here Dem never dey look us such eye buy that guy and others wan use him merit farming strategy come ruin others own. I been think of to raise this issue this morning but you already did thank you for that. If to say na only for local board the guy publish such thing I for reason less because people no go too see am as per say na pidgin or something else but for general board e no make sense at all the way an see it. This could bring small look at the naija board soon.¬† To think of it the guy responded to my comment there trying to prove a point that his right. QuoteThanks so much for your comment... My post may not go well with you even though it hits on reality of things in our present state, it's undisputed that some person's have left internet crimes and focus on making legit money through this platform, however, I understand you very well, from a patriotic point of view as it involves spiling out reality even though it sounds like exposing a whole Country.Learning is a continuous process... With all my degrees, I am still learning especially on this platform as it has to so with something totally out of my scope of knowledge.Thanks ones again. I think is time we have a group outside here to know how to tackle this kind of issues of introducing incompetent people. If we go fit bring them to a group first for orientation before them register for the forum. Make una think of this idea.

So no reason am just let go so that we no go get personal beef with am, this forum is a free place to do whatever we want but doesn't mean we should disrespecting the entire nation in the name to seek for merits just as The Sceptical Chymist talk for him comments i really love the wey him take talk and handle the mata, this is to show say him still love Nigerians and not like others wey hate us.Quote from: Hatchy on December 14, 2023, 11:16:00 AMQuote from: Adbitco on December 14, 2023, 09:32:01 AMI no wan talk much but anyhow una fit comment here make we reason the matter.d truth be say, I no really blame d guy, na person wey introduce am enter forum na e I go blame. I believe say those people wey stick around we local board has learned something and those things dey really help them out.Quote from: Churchillvv on December 14, 2023, 11:39:26 AMI think is time we have a group outside here to know how to tackle this kind of issues of introducing incompetent people. If we go fit bring them to a group first for orientation before them register for the forum. Make una think of this idea. Bring inside group is not the really the problems but what happened there is that this said person has refused to learn even at his rank as newbie still claiming right, do you think this rude person should be added to any group if there where any?No! I no see am as person worth to belong to any group because na problems him/she go cause since him like arguments and na one thing wey me so much dislike even though me get that kind space to add am I no go even try am because na waste time and energy to bring such person to community group since him dey claim about his Degree meaning say people na nonsense for him eyes. Make we just free am then we wey don see this nonsense make we try make the correction before something like this go repeat itself again.

comments.author: sokani
comments.body: As I read de topic, de thing pain me well well. Even if our country don cast like dat no be everything person go dey cap for public space, e just be like no be everything wey dey happen for your family na him you go tell everybody wey you see for outside. Dis kind post e no go well and e go make dis guys to dey look us somehow. Just as BrainBoss bin yan for one of him post like that, wey him talk say reputation for de forum na everything. We dey try build our image here as a person and as a country, with dis kind of thing wey this guy go cap like dis, e dey dent our image. Abeg make we dey guided, make we no dey cap carelessly.

comments.author: Richbased
comments.body: OP I was reading that thread with so much anger and provocation like I don't really know what some persons took this forum for, some kind of social media platform that you can say anything you like?. Just imagine what someone took to the general board to discuss like this is one of the many problems we are facing is this country, not taking things too serious that's why we have too many skit makers and content creators in this country. This kind of threads can make some legendary to troop to the local board to check our activities here and you know what that means a very bad reputation. Well, let's be guided on things we do or say here, this is a platform that is under global watch so let's try as much as possible to exonerate ourselves from things that will tarnish the image and reputation of our local board.

comments.author: Justbillywitt
comments.body: Omo people dey ooo, I wonder why person go enter English board go dey make such a useless post. This user deserves a very hot slap. It's not proper to make such a derogatory post about we country. I don't know why some people behaves like goat. Them go tell una to go school una go say school na scam, now look at how the op is disgracing himself. My suggestion is that he should be go and delete the post. Someone who knows the op should pm him/her informing the person to delete the post immediately. Make we dey try get sense small. No be everything them go teach us for this life.

comments.author: Dr.Bitcoin_Strange
comments.body: The guy did not actually give a good impression for creating such a topic, and he has shown himself as someone who is only here to make money from signature participation. He basically cannot contribute to any serious and meaningful discussion because, judging by what he said already, he is only here to catch fun, and as far as I know, the community is not for fun but some serious, meaningful, and educational discussion. If he actually wants to have some fun, then he should visit the off-topic board and make some unserious topic that will not even gain any attention.Some months ago, he created a topic where he was seeking an opinion on whether he should stop his job and focus on building his account and earning from the signature campaign.The job he said he is earning seven digits per month is still the same job he wants to stop and focus on the forum in order to get paid.Quote from: PhilixCrpt on March 19, 2023, 04:09:33 PMWith only 11 activities and one merit since I joined bitcointalk in January, 2023, I am currently faced with the dilemma on focusing on bitcointalk in other to learn/earn, but my current job is so exhausting that it takes virtually all my time.Bitcointalk is the in-thing, but it requires time and efforts to grow and my Job do not give me enough time. My Job is more like 24hrs Job were I can be called to duty when I am resting/sleeping.Do I quit my Job for Bitcointalk? (This is running through my mind) My Job pays less that $300 a Month.I am in a serious dilemma.I need some motivating advice on what to do.Some of the legendary and hero ranks on the forum are seeing more than $400 a month plus their personal businesses, which earn them more too, so what's PhilixCrpt talking about? It's just a newbie race that he is running, but whoever is his master should guide him very well because the forum is not a company where people get permanent employment.

comments.author: Abu-Naim
comments.body: Very good and valid point Adbitco, I think say na only me de notice all this kind threads. To me ba, no be by force to create thread oo, person fit just de engage for people if you no actually get important information to share because these English boards are general boards so if you come from our Nija local board e go be like u de represent us for there; so make we de very careful with what we bring in the forum, no be everything them they post. I understand say merit hunting de, but if you package and arrange your thread well with meaningful information and links, you will get merits for your effort, so make we de very cautious.
